plugins\/parcelTracking\/core\/template\.Arrivé au point de retrait: Arriving at the pick up point

plugins\/parcelTracking\/desktop\/php\/p.Aucun équipement Template trouvé, clique: No Template equipment found, click on "Add" to start
plugins\/parcelTracking\/desktop\/php\/p.La synchronisation permet de récupérer l: Synchronization allows parcel information to be retrieved without waiting for the next cron
plugins\/parcelTracking\/desktop\/php\/p.Ouvrir une demande d\\'aide sur le forum: Open a help request on the community forum
plugins\/parcelTracking\/desktop\/php\/p.Widget dédié géré par le plugin: Dedicated widget managed by the plugin

plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Choisissez entre un widget par colis ou: Choose between one widget per parcel or a single widget for all parcels
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Choisissez la commande de notification d:
Choose the message type notification command (e.g. Jeemate, JeedomConnect, Slack, or other...).
Leave the field empty to not receive notifications!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Choisissez le scénario à éxécuter.<br\/>:
Choose the scenario to run.
Leave the field empty to avoid receiving notifications!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Durée de conservation de l'équipement ap: Shelf life of equipment after delivery (in days)
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.La vérification permet de récupérer le q: Verification allows you to retrieve the tracking quota remaining on your 17Track account
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Renseignez l'objet parent par défaut con:
Fill in the default parent object configured when creating a parcel.
Leave the field set to 'None' to avoid pre-filling the default object!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Renseignez la clé API après vous être en: Enter the API key after registering on www.17track.net/en
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Renseignez le nombre de jours après lequ:
Enter the number of days after which the delivered parcel is deleted from the plugin.
Leave the field empty to keep parcels!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Sélectionnez la langue utilisée pour les:
Select the language used for API returns. Please note that this will deduct 2 follow-ups per parcel from your quota.
Leave the field set to 'Default language' to keep the carrier's default language!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Vous pouvez utiliser les tags #name#, #o:
You can use the tags #name#, #object#, #trackingId#, #carrier#, #status#, #lastState#, #date# and #time#.
Example: name=#name# numColis=#trackingId# carrier=#carrier# ...
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/co.Vous pouvez utiliser les tags #name#, #t:
You can use #name#, #trackingId#, #carrier#, #status#, #lastState#, #date# and #time# tags.
Leave the field empty to use the default format!

plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/in.Le plugin Suivi colis a été correctement: parcelTracking plugin has been successfully uninstalled. Don't hesitate to leave a review on the Jeedom Market!
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/in.Merci pour l\\'installation du plugin Su: Thank you for installing parcelTracking plugin. Please read the documentation carefully before use and don't hesitate to leave a review on the Jeedom Market !
plugins\/parcelTracking\/plugin_info\/in.Merci pour la mise à jour du plugin Suiv: Thank you for updating parcelTracking plugin. Please read the release notes before use and don't hesitate to leave a review on the Jeedom Market!
